text: Is there a way to query the blog data without authentication?
We are trying to export all contacts and email copies sent to the contacts from HS. Does that make sense?
Just a quick follow up here, I’ve created a ticket for our team to work on this. I’ll follow back up when this is working properly, appreciate the report
Hey Guys, I am new to HubSpot APIs. Can somebody help me in creating reports using HubSpot APIs? I am using HubSpot sequence for account-based marketing.
Also, does anyone know how Can I integrate google sheet to HubSpot? The use case is -> If I update a row in google sheet, it should create a contact in HubSpot.
I’d look into google sheets integration with HubSpot using Zapier for a simple solution.  If you are looking for help programming or need a different solution, let me nkow!
<@U01EPMJUZPZ> I already help someone on the community board with google sheet integration without zapier or any third party tool
<@U01EPMJUZPZ> Create an issue on <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/bd-p/integrations> and ping me on it (with @ and the same pseudo as here) i will take this issue in charge
i'll check out rss feeds. Ended up using the search api.
